gpt_scene_description_list: On a city road, a blue car (car_1) is parked on the left side of the road, with a pedestrian (person_3) inside the car.
Across the yellow line in the middle of the road, another gray car (car_2) is driving on the right side of the road.
Behind the gray car (car_2), there is another car (car_4) following.
There are utility poles beside the road, and trees and buildings can be seen. The weather is clear.
corrected_annotations: On a city road, a blue car (car_1) is driving straight from the left side of the road ahead.
Across the yellow line in the middle of the road, another gray car (car_2) is driving on the right side of the road.
Car_2 drives straight past the ego-vehicle, the ego-vehicle waits for car_2 to pass.
There are utility poles beside the road, and trees and buildings can be seen. The weather is clear.
The ego-vehicle is stopped on the side road, waiting for an opportunity to merge into the main road.
